org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.units.requests

Class FileScopeRequestResultBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.units.requests.FileScopeRequestResultBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFileScopeRequestResult, IRequestResult
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABCFileScopeRequestResult, ASFileScopeRequestResult, EmbedFileScopeRequestResult

    public class FileScopeRequestResultBase
extends Object
implements IFileScopeRequestResult
    Base implementation of an IFileScopeRequestResult.

    • Field Detail

      • definitions

        protected final Collection<IDefinition> definitions
        All the public definitions in the given file scope.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileScopeRequestResultBase

        public FileScopeRequestResultBase(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems,
                          Collection<? extends IASScope> scopes)
        Create an immutable IFileScopeRequestResult object.
        Parameters:
        problems - All the compiler problems will be stored in this collection.
        scopes - Top-level scopes in this request result. The public definitions in the scopes will be collected and stored in field definitions.

    • Method Detail

      • getProblems

        public ICompilerProblem[] getProblems()
        Specified by:
        getProblems in interface IRequestResult
        Returns:
        ICompilerProblems found while computing the result of the request.

      • getScopes

        public IASScope[] getScopes()
        Specified by:
        getScopes in interface IFileScopeRequestResult
        Returns:
        The root IASScope instances for this CompilationUnit. For a compilation unit that processes a source file, the array will contain a single ASFileScope. For a compilation unit that processes ABC, the array will contain one ASFileScope for each "script" in the ABC.

      • getFileScopes

        public ASFileScope[] getFileScopes()

      • getMainDefinition

        public IDefinition getMainDefinition(String qname)
        Specified by:
        getMainDefinition in interface IFileScopeRequestResult
        Returns:
        The externally-visible definition in this compilation unit whose fully-qualified name matches the filepath for the compilation unit, (if one was specified), or null if no such definition exists.

      • getExternallyVisibleDefinitions

        public Collection<IDefinition> getExternallyVisibleDefinitions()
        Get all the public definitions.
        Specified by:
        getExternallyVisibleDefinitions in interface IFileScopeRequestResult
        Returns:
        public definitions

      • addProblems

        protected void addProblems(Collection<ICompilerProblem> newProblems)
        This method allows sub-classes to add problems to the problems collection after running this classes constructor.
        Parameters:
        newProblems - Collection of ICompilerProblem's to add to the problems list for this result object.

      • checkExternallyVisibleDefinitions

        public Collection<ICompilerProblem> checkExternallyVisibleDefinitions(String dottedQName)
        Description copied from interface: IFileScopeRequestResult
        Create compiler problems if the a definition with the specified dotted qualified name is not defined in the IASScopes in this result object or if there is an externally visible definition other than the named definition.
        Specified by:
        checkExternallyVisibleDefinitions in interface IFileScopeRequestResult
        Parameters:
        dottedQName - The dotted fully qualified definition name of the definition that should be the only definition in the IASScopes in this result object.
        Returns:
        Collection of ICompilerProblems
